display_long_description:
StellarX is simply the best way to create and experience custom XR worlds! Over 90K people are already using StellarX to create realistic, interactive, and collaborative VR and Mixed Reality without code. With its intuitive interface that is enabled by AI, StellarX lets you give life in 3D to everything from simple environments to complex interactive scenarios. 

StellarX is driving the digital transformation efforts of giants such as Nikon, ArcelorMittal, Northwell Health, the Government of Canada, and more.

Here are some other things you might like: 

- Create short scenarios and complex storylines with a Visual Canvas. Set up triggers, interactions and behaviors in a heartbeat, all by connecting nodes
- Get started with some of our provided template Spaces, or jump into an empty Space and build from scratch
- Drag-and-drop various objects from our asset collections, or import 3D objects you’ve created or found on Sketchfab. Add in videos, and even sound that StellarX will spatialize
- Let it rain, burn or smoke with Particles, add interactions, or co-create with AI using voice commands
- Join collaborators in real-time inside any Space
- Add customizable NPCs that deliver recorded dialogue and movements

StellarX paid plans now include Conversational AI Agents (in beta) that make your experience fuller by answering questions, conversing with players to give more context, and by transferring knowledge specific to your use-case.
